scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run unit
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && rm -rf deps2 && git clone --quiet https://github.com/heliconialabs/abap-protobuf deps2 && cp deps2/src -r downport && cp src/* -r downport && rm downport/zcl_protobuf*testclasses* && abaplint --fix abaplint_downport.json
